persona: Position 1 battery engineer balancing budget and solar backfeed
message: Engineer, your local optimization strongly favors slots 1 and 2 early in the week, minimizing your spatial carbon exposure by ~15% relative to slot 3. By adhering to this profile, you actively counteract the collective high-demand focus seen by neighbors 2 and 3 in those early slots, stabilizing the local transformer per Day 6 advisory and optimizing cost efficiency.
